QuestData.Title: Silithissues
QuestData.Description: The silithid! They're bugs, $n. Or something like bugs. They're not natural... and we built a fortress on the equivalent of an anthill.$B$BTake this burning pitch. It'll set the buggers on fire and plug up their burrows at the same time. Be careful when you pour this stuff on there - the silithid will come out in swarms!$B$BLook for silithid mounds around the exterior of Desolation Hold. They look like heaps of sand. Kill anything that crawls out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bucket of Burning Pitch on Silithid Mounds and kill 10 Silithid Swarmers as they emerge.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Alliance is nothing. Swarms of those critter-crawlys?$B$B<Crawgol shudders.>
QuestData.RewardText: You're covered in hot tar and bug juice! Don't worry, friend. It'll come off.$B$BSomeday.
